name: Joint Locks
description: Learn the fundamental joint locking techniques in Hapkido used for control and submission.

cards.title: Basic Wrist Lock
cards.description: A technique used to control an opponent by applying pressure on the wrist joint.
bulletpoints: Use circular motion to apply the lock
Maintain close contact to limit opponent's movement
Apply gradual pressure to avoid injury
cards.summaryText: Roll into the wrist with tight contact and steady pressure to seize control safely.

cards.title: Elbow Hyperextension Lock
cards.description: A defensive technique that hyperextends the opponent’s elbow joint.
bulletpoints: Step to the side while applying pressure
Control the opponent’s wrist to limit escape
Use leverage rather than brute force
cards.summaryText: Angle off, capture the wrist, and lever the elbow straight for a clean hyperextension.
